title: Episode 46: Red Jacket Orchards
description: This week, Cathy sits down with Wen-jay Ying, the CSA coordinator for the iconic Red Jacket Orchards. Fun and laughter ensue as they talk about macoun apples, cooking with quinces, and the Healthy Fresh Bodegas Initiative. This episode was brought to you by Edwards of Surry, Virginia.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)

Fun and laughter ensue as they talk about macoun apples, cooking with quinces, and the Healthy Fresh Bodegas Initiative. This episode was brought to you by Edwards of Surry, Virginia.
